data.name: 湖畔往事
data.detailed_description:
·Game introduction

Liu Chuan, who was born with a silver spoon, was walking his dog by the West Lake

when he suddenly encountered a strange celestial phenomenon. It rained with fire

He time travell to the Southern Song Dynasty in AD1134 with a middle school sophomore

There, they met the most important girl in their life

It also opened an unknown and romantic journey of time and space

Countless time and space are intertwined, but they all point in one direction

The once imagined dragon also appeared on the battlefield

Waiting for the protagonists is a fate with nowhere to escape



·Game features

·The main story takes about 10 hours. From the dreamy prosperity of the Southern Song Dynasty,

To a modern city full of flowers, and then to a future city full of science fiction,

The protagonists broke through the shackles of time and fought for the common destiny of mankind



·The story is purely fictional, but it is adapted with some Chinese historical figures

Part of the modern world tries to restore the style of Paradise Hangzhou as much as possible

The Southern Song Dynasty and future cities gave full play to their imagination



·Pixel style plot to RPG game, with mild elements of meat pigeon and cyberpunk

·Dogs and cats will continue to join the game

·Giant suture monster, you can find the colored eggs buried by the author anywhere

·possiblely there will be planting, construction, faction and open world play

data.short_description: indie-RPG game use the RPGmaker engine,a little rougelike and cyberpunk theme.Support keyboard and mouse operation. Possible future development directions include open world play and tower defense, construction, survival and social elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
